column2: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar: Furoagari no Kabe ni Kaketa Seishun - One More Centimeter

Episode 2.5 of the series, will expand on the ending of episode 2 where the boys try to sneak on the girls bathing.

Included in the 1st volume of the Blu-ray/DVD releases.
['Komatsu, Mikako', 'Hosoya, Yoshimasa', 'Shimazaki, Nobunaga', 'Yoshino, Hiroyuki', 'Terui, Haruka', 'Ochiai, Fukushi', 'Anzai, Chika']
